text-align: left;
div.span: 上次 probe 更新元数据之后，promote mirror 之前 FTS 进程退出

div.style: text-align: left;
div.span: 则此次 probe 结果返回 isRoleMirror

div.style: text-align: left;
div.span: 因此需要进入进行 pomote segment 状态

switch.text: 上次 probe 更新元数据之后，promote mirror 之前 FTS 进程退出...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 580px; margin-left: 617px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
1. Primary Segment 处于 Reseting 状态
2. Recover 状态且 making progress
3. double fault

switch.text: 1. Primary Segment 处于 Reseting 状态...
